name: Local Community
description: What will living in a local community mean in 50 years?

actions.template: Ursula tended her hydroponic garden. <placeholder length=4></placeholder>, her <placeholder length=6></placeholder> humming by her side. Ursula was happy that <placeholder>resolved matter</placeholder>. Carrie helped her to <placeholder>task to fulfil</placeholder>. Self-sufficient domes bloomed around them, a vibrant community thrived within their shared living space. It was a warm winter day in 2074. Suddenly, an alarm blared, disrupting the peace.
